attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recognise the vital support that Attendance Allowance (AA) and Disability Living Allowance (DLA) provide to disabled people, and to ensure that these benefits are secured and are not removed as part of any future reform of the social care system in England."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22353


Prime Minister's Office
